feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.36.4
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: delete s3 object when file is deleted (#6117) @abuaboud
  • fix: index trigger events & runs to speed up delete (#6116) @abuaboud
  • fix: simplify delete stale data logic (#6115) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@abuaboud

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.37.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(rbac): support custom project role management (#6066) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: speed up workers with signed urls & enable live updates (#6142) @abuaboud
  • fix: speed up local piece development (#6136) @abuaboud
  • feat: Flow Execution & Workers observability (#6114) @OsamaHaikal

üß© Pieces

  • fix(google-sheets): duplicate & overwrite (#6132) @abuaboud
  • fix(google-drive): files could not be moved (#6140) @AdamSelene
  • fix(file-helper): fix change encoding (#6131) @abuaboud
  • fix(file-helper): change file encoding (#6130) @abuaboud
  • feat(google-drive): add option to support all drives when moving a file (#6128) @AdamSelene

üõ†Ô∏è Piece Framework

  • fix: add object validation processor (#6159) @hazemadelkhalel

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix(sampledata): fix sample data attachment response (#6160) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: allowing json as query params on http piece (#6146) @beyondlevi
  • fix: add object validation processor (#6159) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: rename project roles and fix import flow dialog styling (#6153) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix(ui): read permissions from the server (#6148) @abuaboud
  • fix: infinite loading for testing steps or flows (#6138) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: stop "Catch Webhook" from being invalid by default (#6124) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • chore: update translations (#6164) @abuaboud
  • fix: allow code editor to expand vertically with its content + show logs for code piece runs (#6144) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat(form): fill the form with data from query params (#6154) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat(rbac): allow to update project role in teams page (#6145) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: optimize step files uploading by relying on signed urls (#6129) @abuaboud
  • feat: add active flows and activated users columns to projects table in admin platform (#6123) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat(import-flow): add folder selection to import flow dialog (#6120) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: reorder sidebar items in platform (#6121) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add beyondlevi as a contributor for plugin (#6151) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • chore: automate trial onboarding (#6163) @abuaboud
  • security: upgrade axios from 1.7.7 to 1.7.8 (#6147) @abuaboud
  • refactor: sidebar folders (#6122) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @OsamaHaikal, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @beyondlevi, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr, @levinobregab and @snyk-bot

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.37.1
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: rbac migration for ce edition (#6168) @abuaboud

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • chore: security upgrade axios from 1.7.7 to 1.7.8 (#6166) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@abuaboud and @snyk-bot

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.37.2
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(health): add health page and update routing (#6174) @amrabuaza

üß© Pieces

  • feat(imap): remove binary attachments (#6172) @kishanprmr
  • fix(imap): fix attachments response (#6170) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: auto detect piece name & version in dialog (#6182) @abuaboud
  • feat(platform-message): fix platform dialog visibility and add socket‚Ä¶ (#6181) @amrabuaza
  • fix(engine): parsing objects (#6175) @abuaboud
  • fix: force ui the respect the READ_RUN and other permissions (#6162) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: add project relation to user invitation (#6173) @abuaboud
  • fix: memory usage in pod (#6171) @abuaboud

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat(platform-message): add messages (#6180) @amrabuaza

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @amrabuaza and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.37.3
entry.content:
• fix(slack): fix request action (#6224) @AdamSelene
  • docs: add alegria-solutions as a contributor for plugin (#6216) @allcontributors
  • feat(copilot) - add context & deal with them (#6201) @aboudzein
  • docs: add simonc as a contributor for plugin (#6206) @allcontributors
  • docs: add rafalzawadzki as a contributor for plugin (#6204) @allcontributors
  • feat: support json in array inputs (#6188) @janwytze
  • fix: reconnecting a global connection now is fixed and closing connection dialog now resets its form (#6199) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(copilot) - generated response enhancements (#6101) @aboudzein

‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(flow): skip / unskip steps in the flow (#6211) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: renovate code copilot (#6061) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üß© Pieces

  • feat(ashby): add basic Ashby piece (#6223) @AdamSelene
  • feat(scenario): add Scenario piece with custom api call action (#6221) @AdamSelene
  • feat(bamboohr): add BambooHR piece with custom api call action (#6222) @AdamSelene
  • feat(crypto): generate hmac signature (#6219) @matthieu-lombard
  • feat(callable-flow): add simple/advanced modes to callable flow (#6200) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix(gmail): fix \n adding
    in mail body issue (#6218) @kishanprmr
  • feat(mysql): Allow MySQL Piece Authentication Without Specifying a Database for ‚ÄòExecute Query‚Äô Action (#6177) @beyondlevi
  • feat(twin-labs): Start Browsing Task Action (#6139) @alegria-solutions
  • feat(salesforce): add custom API call action (#6212) @AdamSelene
  • feat(ftp): support ftp protocol (#6209) @abuaboud
  • fix(dropbox): fix support of accented characters in path property (#6176) @simonc
  • feat(gistly): Get Transcript Action (#6179) @rafalzawadzki
  • feat(onedrive): add subfolders in dropdown (#6191) @kishanprmr

üõ†Ô∏è Piece Framework

  • fix(common): use async validation in zod (#6210) @abuaboud

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: local piece caching not clearing (#6220) @kamal
  • fix: audit events projects filter is now working as intended + changing filters now resets pagination cursor (#6202) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: change validation of piece names (#6208) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix(common): use async validation in zod (#6210) @abuaboud
  • fix: show missing step icon and stop converting custom code to mentions (#6196) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: template endpoint scope (#6186) @abuaboud

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: allow retrying runs inside the builder (#6197) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • fix: change validation of piece names (#6208) @hazemadelkhalel

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @aboudzein, @abuaboud, @alegria-solutions, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @beyondlevi, @hazemadelkhalel, @janwytze, @kamal, @kishanprmr, @matthieu-lombard, @rafalzawadzki and @simonc
